content.question: Which of the following is the best example of an aptitude test?

choices.label: A teacher gives a test in class every three weeks to see what students learned.
A company tests applicants for a personality trait that is linked to better job performance.
A teenager must earn a passing score on a written test to get their driverâ€™s license.
A football coach compares each player's leg strength before and after implementing a new conditioning program.

content.answer: A company tests applicants for a personality trait that is linked to better job performance.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
